channel.title: MySQL Errors - Any help?
channel.description:
Okay, so earlier I gotten some progress done on getting my iXat server up for the first time. While doing so, I received the following errors. If ANYBODY is able to fix these, please, help me out.
Here is a screeny of the errors and the code on each line where the errors where located.
Errors: http://prntscr.com/bqmc5
Code on line 594/595: http://prntscr.com/bqme8
Code on line 46: http://prntscr.com/bqmfi
Can someone help? :confused:
PM me to talk further if necessary.

item.title: MySQL Errors - Any help?
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“Tr7, post:3, topic:448778”]Could you help me further?

Ex.: Help me set up the MySQL in that file properly?[/quote]

All you need to do is put in the correct values for the server, username, and password. I can’t help you with that, you need to figure/find out what they are that was setup by you or your hosting service. If you are certain the username and password are correct and are not sure about the server name, try localhost.

Everything else is fine.

Read full topic
